title: Fundamentals of Linux
description: Data school course aimed at beginners to learn about the Linux operating system

courses.title: Fundamentals of Linux: Explore the file system
courses.description: How to use cd, pwd, and ls to explore the file system on a linux server

courses.title: Fundamentals of Linux: Switch between users
courses.description: How to change user on a linux server

courses.title: Fundamentals of Linux: Environment variables
courses.description: What are environment variables and what is bash profile

courses.title: Fundamentals of Linux: Filesystem operations
courses.description: Tutorial to learn navigating the Linux filesystem and the basic operations on files

courses.title: Fundamentals of Linux: Process management
courses.description: Learn how to manage processes in Linux shell.

courses.title: Fundamentals of Linux: Unix Scripts For Text Manipulation
courses.description:
The goal of this course is to present the most common Unix
text manipulation commands

courses.title: Fundamentals of linux: Stream processing and manipulation.
courses.description: The goal of this course is to present some common tools for stream processing and manipulation in the Unix environment

courses.title: Fundamentals of Linux: Connect to a remote server
courses.description: Use SSH to connect to a remote host

courses.title: Fundamentals of Linux: Package manager
courses.description: Tutorial to familiarize with Linux software packages and the tools to manage them.
